TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content: Why is everyone so SQUARE!
Mmm Nick cage with a rocket. Hmm... rockets and science... you gave me an idea, rocket turrets...

AAAAAAARARRRRRRRRRRRRRR..............

IT'S GONNA KILL ME!!!!!!!

(I think mine is going to be hard )
See this bacon mustache and incredible muscles and understand how they boast the truth!
Burn you with engine exhaust
Arrests you for burning an innocent man
Asking myself how did you put a submarine in orbit.
Pulls you closer and shouts "LOOK AT IT CLOSELY!" (it has chemical thrusters on it )
I run away before he kills me.
Uses magic to pull you back in and hugs you instead
Asking myself if he put the sub in orbit in a SSTO(the chemical engine) or if he used more stages.
Tells you that he suddenly went Danny and that's how.
I am a brick wall that weighs down the elevator strongly enough to snap the cables and punch through into the sub-basement.
I ask myself how did a brick get in an elevator, and how I got into a falling elevator.
I start to annoy everybody with pranks about NORWEB and old sausages.

<BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BE-

Ech, sorry comrades, I'm going on a worldwide tour, and I need to sound good.

*plays baseball with you*

(also this is what my avatar is )
Ello Sylveon! How's Kalos? (Had to google that name, didn't know it off the top of my head.)

By the way, Slenderman? I have something for you:

www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Kj6YsUJLzE
Sputnik now belongs to the Impatinum Waterbe. I have a flag on it, so it's mine.
Burn flag rebelliously.
Asking myself what are you while I'm hiding on a corner.

... how am I alive in the same elevator as a reentry (?) burn?

(I think that's what you are, at least...)
Pokes the floating phaseing heart.
starts crying because you broke a heart
